column1: Smoque BBQ////My bf and I split the pulled pork and brisket platters
column2: of which the brisket was way better.  To me
column3: the sides were the superstars.  Baked mac n cheese with perfect consistency
column5: and a fabulous special side of the day - brisket chili.  You get 2 sides with platters
column6: but you can add more for not too much
